steps.title: Add color to the artwork.
steps.content: Add color to the artwork. When you start drawing and painting, it is good to have a color wheel. [1] X Research source It shows the colors opposite to each other. For example, green and red. [2] X Research source In your painting, if red is too bright, use some green, and if green is too bright, you can add a little red to tone it down. [3] X Research source
